Job Title: Software Developer iOS and Full Stack
Job Description: Experience:    0 to 5 yrs                      Description:                       We are looking for multifaceted SW Engineers to help us create multiple AI products. This person will be immediately responsible for UI development and implementation of iOS Apps and eventually will be picking up bigger SW development roles. Job responsibilities:     Design and build applications for the iOS platform   Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications   Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features   Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs   Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization.   Design and develop various SW algorithms (core backend software development).   Design and develop web applications on need basis   Take ownership of daily project needs and communications.   Manage project tasks, timeliness and communication.       Must-have skills:       Proficient with Objective-C or Swift {{depending on project requirements}}, and Cocoa Touch   Experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, etc.   Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning   Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services   Knowledge of other web technologies and UIUX standards   Understanding of Apple s design principles and interface guidelines   Knowledge of low-level C-based libraries is preferred   Experience with performance and memory tuning with tools   Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications   Knack for benchmarking and optimization   Solid foundation in data structures.   Good background in algorithms and strong architectural algorthim skills.
